10
11#ifndef AUDIO_AUDIO_STATE_H_
12#define AUDIO_AUDIO_STATE_H_
13
14#include <map>
15#include <memory>
16#include <unordered_set>
17
18#include "api/sequence_checker.h"
19#include "audio/audio_transport_impl.h"
20#include "audio/null_audio_poller.h"
21#include "call/audio_state.h"
22#include "rtc_base/ref_count.h"
23
24namespace webrtc {
25
26class AudioSendStream;
27class AudioReceiveStream;
28
29namespace internal {
30
31class AudioState : public webrtc::AudioState {
32 public:
33 explicit AudioState(const AudioState::Config& config);
34
35 AudioState() = delete;
36 AudioState(const AudioState&) = delete;
37 AudioState& operator=(const AudioState&) = delete;
38
39 ~AudioState() override;
40
41 AudioProcessing* audio_processing() override;
42 AudioTransport* audio_transport() override;
43
44 void SetPlayout(bool enabled) override;
45 void SetRecording(bool enabled) override;
46
47 void SetStereoChannelSwapping(bool enable) override;
48
49 AudioDeviceModule* audio_device_module() {
50 RTC_DCHECK(config_.audio_device_module);
51 return config_.audio_device_module.get();
52 }
53
54 bool typing_noise_detected() const;
55
56 void AddReceivingStream(webrtc::AudioReceiveStream* stream);
57 void RemoveReceivingStream(webrtc::AudioReceiveStream* stream);
58
59 void AddSendingStream(webrtc::AudioSendStream* stream,
60 int sample_rate_hz,
61 size_t num_channels);
62 void RemoveSendingStream(webrtc::AudioSendStream* stream);
63
64 private:
65 void UpdateAudioTransportWithSendingStreams();
66 void UpdateNullAudioPollerState();
67
68 SequenceChecker thread_checker_;
69 SequenceChecker process_thread_checker_;
70 const webrtc::AudioState::Config config_;
71 bool recording_enabled_ = true;
72 bool playout_enabled_ = true;
73
74 // Transports mixed audio from the mixer to the audio device and
75 // recorded audio to the sending streams.
76 AudioTransportImpl audio_transport_;
77
78 // Null audio poller is used to continue polling the audio streams if audio
79 // playout is disabled so that audio processing still happens and the audio
80 // stats are still updated.
81 std::unique_ptr<NullAudioPoller> null_audio_poller_;
82
83 std::unordered_set<webrtc::AudioReceiveStream*> receiving_streams_;
84 struct StreamProperties {
85 int sample_rate_hz = 0;
86 size_t num_channels = 0;
87 };
88 std::map<webrtc::AudioSendStream*, StreamProperties> sending_streams_;
89};
90} // namespace internal
91} // namespace webrtc
92
93#endif // AUDIO_AUDIO_STATE_H_
94
